disthrikka mattamen gathkala ampare niyojithayan 59k, thrikunamalayen niyojithayan 27k, madakalapuwen niyojithayan 24k, puththalamen niyojithayan 17k, kurunagalen niyojithayan 07k, mahanuwaren 12k, mannaramen niyojithayan 08k, anuradhapuren niyojithayan 05k, kalutharen ha mathalin niyojithayan 04 baginda, badullen ha kolambain niyojithayan 03 baginda, gampahen ha gallen niyojithayan 02ka bagin saha polonnaruwa ,mathara, kagalla,wawuniyawa, mulathiw, nuwara eliya yana disthrikkawala niyojithayan 01ka baginda muslim kongrasaya wishishta jaya labagena atha.
